title: No Place to Hide
description: Fleeing England from a broken marriage, Justine returns to her grandmotherâ€™s hometown on picturesque Lake Maxinkuckee, Indiana. There she hopes for a fresh start, and a chance to heal her broken heart in the pristine lakeside surroundings. But an ocean may not be enough to protect Justine from the devastating secrets that drove her away, and the memories that continue to haunt her new life...
author: Susan    Lewis
